arcane.label: Arcane
arcane.desc: Arcane magic is the purest form of magic, concerned with the control of raw magical energy itself as well as mastering the elements of fire and ice. Wizards are the only class that gain access to arcane magic.

spells.label: Lesser Shielding
spells.desc: The wizard receives 1 armour and 1 magic reduction. Does not stack with other 'Shielding' spells.

spells.label: Blink
spells.desc: Immediately move to any spot within range of your movement and line of sight. Can be used while snared but not rooted.

spells.label: Telekinesis
spells.desc: The caster can lift, with the power of their mind, a creature or object under 200KG. Enemy creatures must make a saving throw (INT vs INT) or be lifted for one round.

spells.label: Summon Light
spells.desc: Summon a magical light which follows the caster for up to 1 hour. Can be dismissed byt the caster at any time.

spells.label: Arcane Missiles
spells.desc: Fires a number of missiles equal to INT, each attacking (INT vs dodge) random nearby enemies for 1d4 arcane damage.

spells.label: Burning Hands
spells.desc: Attack INT vs dodge on a target in melee range, deals 1d8+INT fire damage.

spells.label: Shielding
spells.desc: The wizard receives 1 armour and 1 magic reduction. Does not stack with other 'Shielding' spells.

spells.label: Open Lock
spells.desc: The caster can make a 'lockpick' check using their INT+1.

spells.label: Detect Magic
spells.desc: The caster becomes generally aware of any magic effects within 10m.

spells.label: Swap
spells.desc: The caster swaps places with another friendly character within 10m.

spells.label: Eye of Zomm
spells.desc: Summon a floating eye which the caster can 'see' through and control. Useful for scouting, however the eye is visible to others.

spells.label: Magic Sword
spells.desc: The caster summons a sword made of pure arcane energy that only they can wield for 3 rounds. It has a +1 modifier to attack and does 1d8+INT arcane damage.

spells.label: Summon Imp
spells.desc: Call forth a small imp who has 3d6 hitpoints, 0 armour, 1 magic reduction, 15 dodge, 1d20+4 attack and does 1d6+3 fire damage.

spells.label: Frost Nova
spells.desc: Attack INT vs INT on all enemy targets within 3m, on hit the targets take 1d4+INT ice damage and are rooted.

spells.label: Fireball
spells.desc: Attack INT vs dodge on a target within 10m and all characters within 1m of the target. On hit deals 2d4+INT fire damage.

spells.label: Invisibility
spells.desc: Your target magically vanishes from sight for 1d4+INT rounds/minutes. Only creatures with 'see invisible' will be able to see them. Performing any aggressive action with remove the invisibility.

spells.label: Flame Shield
spells.desc: Engulf an ally in protective flames, giving them 2 magic reduction. The next melee attack against that character will cause the shield to burst, dealing 1d8+INT fire damage to the attacker.

spells.label: Cancel Magic
spells.desc: Remove 1d4 magical effects on the target (works for both beneficial effects on enemies, and negative effects on allies).

spells.label: Identify
spells.desc: The caster learns the magical properties of a chosen magic item they are touching.

spells.label: Dimensional Door
spells.desc: The caster creates a dimensional hole in a wall or door for INT minutes, allowing him to pass through it temporarily. The hole can be dismissed by the caster at any time.

spells.label: Summon Elemental
spells.desc: Summon an elemental of your choice (fire or ice), the elemental has health, dodge and armour equal to the caster and does 1d8+INT damage (of the elemental type).

spells.label: Icy Sword
spells.desc: The caster summons a sword made of pure ice that only they can wield for 3 rounds. It has a +2 modifier to attack and does 1d10+INT ice damage.

spells.label: Summon Food
spells.desc: Conjure a selection of food. The food is enough for roughly 4 medium sized people.

spells.label: Choking Cloud
spells.desc: Create a cloud of choking gas at a target location of size 3mx3m, giving all creatures within -1 to attack and suffering 1d4 damage when starting their turn within the cloud.

spells.label: Icy Grasp
spells.desc: Attack INT vs INT on enemy target within 10m. On hit deals 3d4+INT ice damage and the target is rooted.

spells.label: Black Death
spells.desc: Summon tendrils of black smoke to damage and hold your opponent. Attack INT vs Dodge on enemy target within 10m. On hit deals 1d6+INT dark damage and the target is grappled with a strength of 10+INT. Each round the target must make STR saving throw or continue to be grappled and take 1d6 damage.

spells.label: Mirror Image
spells.desc: Create INT identical copies of yourself, confusing enemy creatures. Each enemy attacking the caster must roll 1d20, on 10 or below their attack will target a mirror image. Images die after taking any damage.

spells.label: Major Shielding
spells.desc: The wizard receives 3 armour and 3 magic reduction. Does not stack with other 'Shielding' spells.

spells.label: Teleport
spells.desc: Instantly transports the caster to a chosen previously visited location in the world.

spells.label: Levitate
spells.desc: The caster levitates up to 1m off the ground and can move around freely for up to 1 hour.

spells.label: Flaming Sword
spells.desc: The caster summons a sword made of pure fire that only they can wield for 3 rounds. It has a +3 modifier to attack and does 1d12+INT fire damage.

spells.label: Blizzard
spells.desc: Rain ice at a target location of size 3mx3m, attacking INT vs dodge on all creatures within the area now and at the start of your next turn. On hit deals 1d8+INT ice damage.

spells.label: Chain Lightning
spells.desc: Attack INT vs dodge on a enemy target within 10m, on hit that character takes 2d8+INT arcane damage. The lightning then bounces to up to 3 other enemy targets in distance order. Each enemy can only be hit once byt the chain.

spells.label: Blur
spells.desc: The target becomes a blurred image, causing all attacking characters to roll with disadvantage until the casters next turn.

spells.label: Crystalize
spells.desc: Coat yourself in hard crystal, gaining 5 armour and 5 magic reduction at the cost of being rooted. Does not stack with other 'Shielding' spells.

spells.label: Group Teleport
spells.desc: The caster can transport themselves and any characters they are touching to any previously visited location.

spells.label: Enter Plane
spells.desc: The caster can transport themselves and any characters they are touching to another plane, if they are in the presence of a planar rift.

spells.label: Summon Greater Elemental
spells.desc: Summon an elemental of your choice (fire or ice), the elemental has health, dodge and armour equal to the caster and does 2d8+INT damage (of the elemental type). The elemental is also immune to damage of its type.

spells.label: Arcane Sword
spells.desc: The caster summons a sword made of pure arcane energy that only they can wield for 3 rounds. It has a +5 modifier to attack and does 2d8+INT arcane damage.

spells.label: Disintegrate
spells.desc: Create a beam of devastating energy originating at the caster and 10m in length. Attack INT vs INT on each character in the line, dealing 3d8+INT arcane damage to any creatures in it's path.

spells.label: Call Meteor
spells.desc: Calls down a burning meteor from the sky on a target area 3mx3m. At the start of the casters next turn, any characters within the area take 4d6+INT fire damage.

dark.label: Dark
dark.desc: The powers of death and reanimation, available to necromancers and reavers.

light.label: Light
light.desc: The holy power of Marr, available to clerics and paladins.

spells.label: Lesser Protection
spells.desc: Grant a friendly target +1 armour and +1 magic reduction against any attacks. Does not stack with other 'Protection' spells.

spells.label: Lesser Healing
spells.desc: Heal the target for 1d4+SPI health.

spells.label: Lesser Blessing
spells.desc: The target receives +1 on all checks and attack rolls for 1 hour. Does not stack with other Blessing spells.

spells.label: Cure Poison
spells.desc: Purge any poison from the target character.

spells.label: Weaken Evil
spells.desc: Attack SPI vs SPI on target undead or demon, on hit the target suffers -1 STR

spells.label: Holy Light
spells.desc: Attack SPI vs dodge, on hit deals 1d4+SPI damage. Deals an additional 1d6 damage against undead or demons.

spells.label: Protection
spells.desc: Grant a friendly target +2 armour and +2 magic reduction. Does not stack with other 'Protection' spells.

spells.label: Lesser Symbol
spells.desc: Mark a friendly target with a holy symbol, granting them 1d6+SPI temporary health.

spells.label: Cure Disease
spells.desc: Purge any disease from the target character.

spells.label: Healing
spells.desc: Heal the target for 2d4+SPI health.

spells.label: Turn Undead
spells.desc: Attack SPI vs SPI on a target undead. Deals 1d8+SPI light damage and the target is stunned.

spells.label: Greater Healing
spells.desc: Heal the target for 3d4+SPI health.

spells.label: Circle of Healing
spells.desc: All friendly characters within 1m are healed for 1d8+SPI health.

spells.label: Blessing
spells.desc: The target receives +2 on all checks and attack rolls for 1 hour. Does not stack with other Blessing spells.

spells.label: Purge
spells.desc: Purge any single negative condition from the target.

spells.label: Equalizing Light
spells.desc: Creates a blast of holy energy at a target area of size 3mx3m, attack SPI vs SPI on each enemy target in the area. On hit deals 1d6+SPI light damage. Heals all friendly characters in the blast for 1d6+SPI health.

spells.label: Symbol
spells.desc: Mark a friendly target with a holy symbol, granting them 2d6+SPI temporary health.

spells.label: Revive
spells.desc: Make a SPI saving throw vs a DC of 10 plus the target characters level. On a success the character is brought back from the dead at their previous level -1. If the character died before the last short or long rest, this cannot be used. Casting this spell exhausts all the casters spell slots and leaves them exhausted.

spells.label: Greater Protection
spells.desc: Grant a friendly target +3 armour and +3 magic reduction. Does not stack with other 'Protection' spells.

spells.label: Greater Blessing
spells.desc: The target receives +3 on all checks and attack rolls for 1 hour. Does not stack with other 'Blessing' spells.

spells.label: Holy Word
spells.desc: Attack SPI vs SPI on all enemies within earshot, on hit they take 2d4+INT light damage. Deals an additional 1d8 to undead or demons.

spells.label: Greater Symbol
spells.desc: Mark a friendly target with a holy symbol, granting them 3d6+SPI temporary health.

spells.label: Resurrect
spells.desc: Make a SPI saving throw vs a DC of 10 plus the target characters level. On a success the character is brought back from the dead at their previous level -1. If the character has been dead for longer than 1 year, this cannot be used. Casting this spell exhausts all the casters spell slots and leaves them exhausted.

spells.label: Angel's Fury
spells.desc: Attack SPI vs SPI on target enemy within 10m, deals 2d8+SPI light damage. Does an additional 1d6+SPI damage to demons and undead.

spells.label: Marr's Vengeance
spells.desc: Grant divine protection to a target, the next fatal damage they would take is ignore and they can immediately make an attack against the attacking enemy.

spells.label: Spirit Guardians
spells.desc: Summon 2 protective spirits around yourself. Each spirit will block one source of damage before disappearing.

nature.label: Nature
nature.desc: The power of the nature and weather.

spells.label: Strength of the Bear
spells.desc: Grant a friendly target SPI strength for their check or attack.

spells.label: Camouflage
spells.desc: The caster blends into the wilderness, becoming invisible for 1d4+SPI rounds. Only works outdoors. Making any aggressive action removes it.

spells.label: Ensnaring Roots
spells.desc: Attack SPI vs dodge, on hit deals 1d4+SPI damage and the target is snared for 3 rounds.

spells.label: Call Lightning
spells.desc: Attack SPI vs SPI on target, on hit the target suffers 1d4+SPI nature damage and is stunned.

spells.label: Lesser Healing
spells.desc: Heal the target for 1d4+SPI health

spells.label: Skin Like Wood
spells.desc: Grant a friendly target 1 armour and 1 magic reduction.

spells.label: Eyes of the Hawk
spells.desc: Grant a friendly target SPI attack on their next turn.

spells.label: Thorny Vines
spells.desc: Attack SPI vs SPI, on hit wraps the target in vines for 3 rounds, rooting and 1d4+SPI damage at the start of it's turn.

spells.label: Call Hurricane
spells.desc: Attack SPI vs dodge on all creates in a 3mx3m area, on hit deals 1d8+SPI damage and the targets are knocked down.

spells.label: Spider Form
spells.desc: Take the form of a small spider for 1d4+SPI rounds/minutes. While in spider form the caster is considered basically invisible.

spells.label: Speed of the Cheetah
spells.desc: Grant a friendly target SPI Agility for their next turn.

spells.label: Skin Like Rock
spells.desc: Grant a friendly target 4 armour and 4 magic reduction, however they are also snared.

spells.label: Summon Wind
spells.desc: Call on the winds to help you levitate off the ground for 1d4+SPI rounds.

spells.label: Charm Animal
spells.desc: Attack SPI vs SPI on a target animal, if it hits, the animal is charmed next round.

spells.label: Bird Form
spells.desc: Take the form of a small bird for 1d4+SPI rounds/minutes. While in bird form the caster can fly.

spells.label: Healing
spells.desc: Heal the target for 2d4+SPI health

spells.label: Skin Like Steel
spells.desc: Grant a friendly target 6 armour and 6 magic reduction, however they are also snared.

spells.label: Poison Cloud
spells.desc: Summon a cloud of poison at a target area of size 3mx3m of strength 1d20+SPI, all characters in the area must make a saving throw each turn or be damaged by the poison for 1d4+SPI nature damage.

spells.label: Wolf Form
spells.desc: Take the form of a large wolf for 1d4+SPI rounds/minutes. While in wolf form the caster gains a +2 to STR and AGI, and rolls 2d8+STR for damage.

spells.label: Greater Healing
spells.desc: Heal the target for 3d4+SPI health.

spells.label: Ankh of Reversal
spells.desc: Mark the friendly target, the next fatal damage they would take actually heals them for that amount instead.

mind.label: Mind
mind.desc: The power to alter the mind, available to Enchanters.
